author: Special Correspondent
text: A popular radio jockey of private FM radio channel Radio Mirchi, Kunal Desai, surrendered before the police after he was charged with abettment of suicide of his wife, who allegedly killed herself by jumping from a 10-storeyed residential building here. After the death of Bhumi (28), two months after her wedding, her parents complained Kunal was harassing her.
title: Radio jockey surrenders
